name: TURBO TOREADOR 1999: MECHA BULLS
description:
Well, how about a bull final boss fight... IN SPACE?

Raise your cape and gather the bull's bullets to make it red! Then show it to his eye and make him see red! While he's angered by this, your normal bullets do extra damage!

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move around

Z: Fire bullet

X while you are at 100%: Raise cape

Timer included! How fast can you beat the boss?

Coding (Construct 2): Frederik "YamiMario" B.P., frederikbertrampoulsen@gmail.com

Sprites: Arthur "Daya" Biver, biver.arthur@gmail.com

Sound effects: THE MATCH-MAKERS, http://osabisi.sakura.ne.jp/m2/

Music: "8-Bit Mayham", "Cyber Dream", and "Thrashy Aliens" by by Eric Matyas, www.soundimage.org

Game created for Epic Game Jam during summer 2016.
